body_html:
So it sounds like the crash was resolved in 1.0.1. That's good. @pedropgusmao please let us know if you still see this after upgrading to 1.0.1.

@abdasgupta you mention a stacktrace with waitpid(-1), could you post the full stacktrace? Also how are you collecting it?
